response.job_title: Especialista eléctrico | Energías Renovables | Regulación y mercados eléctricos | Nuevas tecnologías en el sector eléctrico | Apasionado por los nuevos retos
response.summary:
Electrical engineer, master’s in electrical engineer, and Ph.D. candidate in power systems. Professional
experience in renewable project development in Colombia. Strong knowledge of electrical regulation
and energy storage systems. Skills in programming, optimization, electrical systems analysis, and
simulation. I distinguish myself as a responsible person, highly creative, with a high capacity for
teamwork, and committed to renewable energy development.
response.skills: Energy storage , Power systems , Optimization, Red eléctrica inteligente, Sistemas de energía, Ingeniería de proyectos, Programación, Matlab, Microsoft Excel, Análisis de sistemas de potencia, Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería eléctrica, DigSilent, Neplan, PSS/E, Análisis de datos, Docencia universitaria

profile_positions.location: Ciudad de México, Federal District, Mexico
profile_positions.title: PHD Researcher

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for managing the Electric Area of the Company, supporting general manager decisions making, reviewing, and analyzing electrical regulation in Colombia. I prepared reports about new interconnection opportunities for wind and solar plants in the Colombian electrical system.
profile_positions.title: Electric engineer

profile_positions.description: I worked as a consultant engineer for different companies in topics related to the electrical industry, such as elaboration of interconnection studies, protection coordination studies, electrical energy regulation analyses, and data analysis in renewable energy projects.
profile_positions.title: Independent Consultor

profile_positions.description: I worked in the Electrical Studies Department, leading the development of interconnection studies for wind, solar, hydro, and thermal plants. I prepared expansion planning studies for different locations in Colombia and held a relationship with main actors in the electric sector, such as UPME, CREG, and several system transmission and distribution operators.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer/Interconnection studies leader

profile_positions.description: I worked on the Renewable Development Area of the Company in the techno-economic assessment of solar projects. I prepared interconnection studies for the solar projects and the conceptual and basic design of the plants. I also participated in the land negotiation for some projects.
profile_positions.title: Electrical engineer

profile_positions.description: I was the teacher in charge of the course Installations and Electrical Machinesfor Mechanical engineering students at the undergraduate level. I developed the course syllabus, as well as laboratory practices.
profile_positions.title: Docente asistente (Becario de posgrado)

company.name: Mainstream Renewable Power
company.description:
Mainstream Renewable Power is a leading pure-play renewable energy company, with wind and solar assets across global markets, including in Latin America, Africa, and Asia-Pacific.

Our mission is to accelerate the global transition to renewable energy by delivering clean, affordable and reliable energy at scale.

We are one of the most successful developers of gigawatt-scale renewables platforms, across onshore wind, offshore wind, and solar power generation with a global portfolio of 27 GW. 
  
In May 2021, Aker Horizons acquired a majority stake in Mainstream, and in April 2022, Mitsui & Co., Ltd. joined Aker Horizons as a long-term strategic investor. 

We currently employ over 600 people across 5 continents, and we are always looking for ambitious, driven, and talented people to join us on our mission to drive forward the energy transition.

To learn more, visit our website at: www.mainstreamrp.com/careers/

location.address: Ground Floor, Block G Central Park
